channel.title: Problems
channel.description:
Hi I've just downloaded Moparscape Version 3.2, and have encountered multiple problems including.....
-Can't access skill guides -Can't talk to NPC's -When I equip some items it disconnects me and I can't use that account again
How do I fix this?

item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @barrows_ftw1 barrows ftw
item.description:
@barrows_ftw1 wrote:

play the webclient or get a different non sh*ted up scource but it probably your client

Read full topic

item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

These are private servers
They are not complete.

You could make your own client and fix these things.
Go to the Client Hacking Section - It owns

Read full topic
